overview: Dafa aspires to be a hafizh of the Quran. Just when his wish was about to be fulfilled, a tough trial came. The mother, Humaira received a doctor's verdict of suffering from leukemia. The father, Yusuf asks Dafa to go home and accompany his mother who is in critical condition. Dafa was forced to return to his home and school in his village
title: Surga Menanti
